document.full_text: organizers of the tony awards also announced special honors for eve ensler, bill berloni, the drama book shop and sharon jensen and alliance for inclusion in the arts.
document.title: athol fugard and philip j. smith to receive tony awards for lifetime achievement
lines_and_colors: organizers of the tony awards also announced special honors for eve ensler, bill berloni, the drama book shop and sharon jensen and alliance for inclusion in the arts.
